Posts.Content: Kim64 wrote: I just had a lumpectomy and sentinel node removal last Friday.  The surgeon also inserted a temporary port for the Mammosite at that time.  Today I came in for a follow-up, got the path report that shows no clear margin and re-excision was highly recommended.  The surgeon told me I had 2 options:  re-excision or mastectomy.  So I scheduled for the re-excision for next Wednesday.  Is this too soon to schedule another surgery only 1 and 1/2 week after the first one?  Should I wait for another week?  I just want to get it out and get it overwith.  He also removed the temporary catheter since I can't do the Mammosite with my situation.
